Package CAMs_App.service

Class StudentCampService

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.service.StudentCampService
public class StudentCampService extends Object
The class StudentCampService is responsible in managing the camp-related functionalities for student users

    • checkClash

      private static boolean checkClash(Camp camp1, Camp camp2)
      Checks where the two camps clash/overlaps in terms of date
      Parameters:
      camp1 - : The first camp
      camp2 - : The second camp
      Returns:
      true if the dates do not clash,false dates do clash

    • checkCampClashDate

      public static boolean checkCampClashDate()
      Checks if the camp to be registered clashes with the camps that already has been registered.
      Returns:
      true if there is a date clash, false otherwise

    • checkRegisterDeadline

      public static boolean checkRegisterDeadline()
      Checks if the register deadline for the current camp has passed
      Returns:
      true if the register deadline has not passed, false otherwise

    • isCampFull

      public static boolean isCampFull()
      Check is the current camp capacity is full
      Returns:
      true if the camp has no more slots,false otherwise

    • updateRemainingSlot

      public static void updateRemainingSlot()
      Updates the current camp's remaining slots after a student registers for the camp

    • checkWithdrawBefore

      public static boolean checkWithdrawBefore()
      Checks if the student has withdrawn from the camp before
      Returns:
      true if the student has withdrawn from the camp, false otherwise

    • withdrawCamp

      public static void withdrawCamp(String campName, Student student, boolean isComittee)
      Student user withdraws from the current camp
      Parameters:
      campName - : Name of camp to be withdrawn
      student - : Current student
      isComittee - : Whether the student is a camp committee member
